規.definition: compass; a rule; regulation; to admonish; to plan; to scheme

規制.definition: to regulate; rules and regulations; regulatory; style and structure (esp. of building)

規劃.definition: to draw up a plan; to map out a program; a plan; a program

規培.definition: (of a medical graduate) to undertake standardized training (as a resident doctor in a hospital) (abbr. for 規範化培訓|规范化培训[gui1 fan4 hua4 pei2 xun4])

規定.definition: to stipulate; to specify; to prescribe; to fix (a price); to set (a quota); regulations; rules; provisions; stipulations

規律.definition: rule (e.g. of science); law of behavior; regular pattern; rhythm; discipline

規復.definition: to restore (deposed monarch, rule, system of laws, ecological system etc); restoration

規戒.definition: variant of 規誡|规诫[gui1 jie4]

規整.definition: according to a pattern; regular; orderly; structured; neat and tidy

規矩.definition: lit. compass and set square; fig. established standard; rule; customs; practices; fig. upright and honest; well-behaved

規矩準繩.definition: compasses, set square, spirit level and plumbline (idiom); fig. established standard; norms; criteria

規矩繩墨.definition: compasses, set square and straight line marker (idiom); fig. established standard; norms; criteria

規範.definition: norm; standard; specification; regulation; rule; within the rules; to fix rules; to regulate; to specify

規行矩步.definition: to follow the compass and go with the set square (idiom); to follow the rules inflexibly; to act according to convention

規誡.definition: to warn (against some course); to admonish

規諫.definition: to remonstrate; to warn earnestly (esp. classical written Chinese); to exhort
